member.name: M:RGN.Modules.Matchmaking.MatchmakingModule.SetRGNCore(RGN.IRGNRolesCore)
member.summary: Sets the Ready Games Network (RGN) core reference.
member.param: The RGN core to be set.

member.name: M:RGN.Modules.Matchmaking.MatchmakingModule.Init
member.summary: Initializes the MatchmakingModule. This method is currently empty and can be filled with initial setup logic if needed in the future.

member.name: M:RGN.Modules.Matchmaking.MatchmakingModule.Dispose
member.summary: Releases all resources used by the MatchmakingModule. This method is currently empty and can be filled with cleanup logic if needed in the future.

member.name: M:RGN.Modules.Matchmaking.MatchmakingModule.GetJoinOpenMatchesAsync(System.Int32,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously gets a list of open matches that the user can join
member.param: An integer indicating the maximum number of matches to retrieve.
An optional parameter representing a matches id after which to start retrieving the matches. The default is an empty string.
Cancellation token to cancel the async operation. Optional
member.returns: A Task that represents the asynchronous operation. The Task result contains a list of objects, which are the open to join matches.

member.name: M:RGN.Modules.Matchmaking.MatchmakingModule.GetVoteOpenMatchesAsync(System.Int32,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously gets a list of open matches that the user can vote. Some matches can have voting enabled. If the voting is enabled the users can vote for the match participants
member.param: An integer indicating the maximum number of matches to retrieve.
An optional parameter representing a matches id after which to start retrieving the matches. The default is an empty string.
Cancellation token to cancel the async operation. Optional
member.returns: A Task that represents the asynchronous operation. The Task result contains a list of objects, which are the open to vote matches.

member.name: M:RGN.Modules.Matchmaking.MatchmakingModule.GetFinishedMatchesAsync(System.Int32,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously gets a list of finished matches
member.param: An integer indicating the maximum number of matches to retrieve.
An optional parameter representing a matches id after which to start retrieving the matches. The default is an empty string.
Cancellation token to cancel the async operation. Optional
member.returns: A Task that represents the asynchronous operation. The Task result contains a list of objects, which are the finished matches for current app.

member.name: T:RGN.Modules.Matchmaking.MatchmakingData
member.summary: Represents the data required for the matchmaking process.

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Matchmaking.MatchmakingData.id
member.summary: Gets or sets the identifier of the matchmaking data.

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Matchmaking.MatchmakingData.appId
member.summary: Gets or sets the application identifier.

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Matchmaking.MatchmakingData.type
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of the matchmaking.

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Matchmaking.MatchmakingData.finishType
member.summary: Gets or sets the finish type of the matchmaking.

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Matchmaking.MatchmakingData.startType
member.summary: Gets or sets the start type of the matchmaking.

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Matchmaking.MatchmakingData.maxUsers
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of users for the matchmaking.

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Matchmaking.MatchmakingData.isStarted
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the matchmaking has started.

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Matchmaking.MatchmakingData.votingEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether voting is enabled for the matchmaking.

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Matchmaking.MatchmakingData.oncePerUserVoting
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a user can vote only once in the matchmaking.

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Matchmaking.MatchmakingData.createdBy
member.summary: Gets or sets the user who created the matchmaking.

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Matchmaking.MatchmakingData.createdAt
member.summary: Gets or sets the timestamp when the matchmaking was created.

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Matchmaking.MatchmakingData.updatedAt
member.summary: Gets or sets the timestamp when the matchmaking was last updated.

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Matchmaking.MatchmakingData.participants
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of participants in the matchmaking.

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Matchmaking.MatchmakingData.votes
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of votes in the matchmaking.

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Matchmaking.MatchmakingData.participantsScore
member.summary: Gets or sets the scores of the participants in the matchmaking.

member.name: M:RGN.Modules.Matchmaking.MatchmakingData.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string that represents the current object.
member.returns: A string that represents the current object.
